item.description:
Ooops, I guess we almost missed this Monday with so many for just a few of us (mainly Dev and I.) to deal with.  Well I guess that means it's time to kick off March with the Irish Go-To...

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

3/5/2012 Location is:

Anna Liffeys'

Anna Liffeys is a charming old Irish Pub in Downtown New Haven.  It's a great place for good pub food and friends. Located on Whitney Avenue, just after it changes over from Church Street, with a big old Irish Flag out front.  Don't be deceived if you don't see anyone in the window, a lot of the time the Fun is in the downstairs bar which is open just about all the time.

No particular specials this time, just whatever Liffey's decides to run on the day.

If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour Type Events, please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Your contact/host is Me (AJ 315-345-9348).  You can call, but I recommend Texting as Cell phone reception inside Anna Liffey's is often elusive.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / Call the "Contact/host" from event description (AJ in this case), cell phone number listed below. We're also usually one of the largest groups at the bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - Anna Liffey's
